message.content:
Thank you for the previous information. Based on what you've told me:

1. Onetree Essential Oil Diffuser: This diffuser has a capacity of 150 ml and includes an auto shut-off feature when water runs out. The maximum run time is up to 5 hours, with LED lights that provide various color options.

2. Anjou Essential Oil Diffuser: With a larger capacity of 300 ml, this diffuser can run up to 8 hours continuously or using scheduled timing modes (1/3/6 hrs). It also has an auto shut-off function and seven changing mood lights.

Based on your preferences:

- If you prefer a long-lasting essential oil diffusion experience with more control over timing modes, then the Anjou Essential Oil Diffuser would be more suitable due to its larger capacity and adjustable timings.
- However, if compact size is important for easy portability or desire fewer light variations while being mindful of budget constraints, the Onetree Essential Oil Diffuser might be a better fit for your needs as it has similar features but at half the price compared to Anjou's option.

Ultimately, both options seem great in terms of functionality; it will mainly come down to personal preference regarding design aspects and whether having additional capabilities justifies spending twice as much money on one device over another based on individual priorities!
